name: Traffic (Nemesis Games)
description:
TRAFFIC

traffic

/ˈtrafɪk/

vehicles moving on a public highway.

Did you know that Bengaluru is the world's most traffic congested city?

Yes, commuters lose 243 hours on average (10 days and 3 hours) every year due to traffic. During this time one could have planted 244 trees, watched 215 episodes of Game of Thrones or watched 139 football matches!

Play TRAFFIC to save time.

Credits

Models :  Pleasant Park by Shallow Lagoon,

City Voxel Pack by PoèMe.

Music : 8Bit Color Codes Game Music-Vol 1 by August Hansen. 

Sound Effects : FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom,

Grenade Sound FX by MGWSoundDesign.

Font : Nerko One by Nermin Kahrimanovic.
